Plot: Anna Fitzgerald looks to earn medical emancipation from her parents who until now have relied on their youngest child to help their leukemia-stricken daughter Kate remain alive.
Title: My Sister's Keeper
Writer: Jeremy Leven (screenplay), Nick Cassavetes (screenplay), Jodi Picoult (novel)
Actors: Abigail Breslin, Walter Raney, Sofia Vassilieva, Cameron Diaz
tomatoConsensus: My Sister's Keeper gets fine performances from its adult and child actors, but the director's heavy-handed approach turns a worthy emotional subject into an overly melodramatic tearjerker.
